name: Dock.io
description: In 2017, Dock was established to solve the problems inherent in existing data solutions. We are a Verifiable Credentials company that provides Dock Certs, a user-friendly, no-code platform, a developer solution that enable organizations to issue, manage and verify fraud-proof credentials efficiently, securely, and at a lower cost. Dock allows organizations and individuals to create and share verified data. We do this for organizations in diverse sectors.
features: Reduce verification friction without sacrificing security
business_objectives: Hire Top Talent Faster and More Efficiently
sub_categories: Software and Services Related to HR Software
Headline: Redefining TRUST Through Verified Data
ShortDescription: Accelerate customer onboarding with Reusable ID

Highlights.name: Accelerate customer onboarding
Highlights.description: Improve conversion rates by allowing customers to bypass repeated data entry and physical document submission to verify their identity faster.

Highlights.name: Create a new ecosystem of verifiers
Highlights.description: Enable companies to issue ID credentials and expand your market reach by generating demand for that high-quality, verified ID data from a new market of verifiers.

Highlights.name: Lead the way with eIDAS and mDLs
Highlights.description: The emergence of digital ID wallets and documents, underpinned by the eIDAS and mobile driver's licenses (mDLs), is redefining how we manage our identities.

enhanced_description: Dock.io, established in 2017, is a verifiable credentials company offering Dock Certs. It provides a user-friendly, no-code platform and a developer solution that enables organizations to issue, manage, and verify fraud-proof credentials efficiently, securely, and at a lower cost. Redefining trust through verified data, Dock allows organizations and individuals to create and share verified data. This solution helps in hiring top talent faster and more efficiently within HR, and also accelerates customer onboarding with reusable IDs, improving conversion rates by allowing customers to bypass repeated data entry. Dock facilitates the creation of new ecosystems of verifiers and leads the way in digital identity management by supporting standards like eIDAS and mobile driver's licenses (mDLs).
key_use_cases: Issuing, managing, and verifying fraud-proof credentials
Accelerating talent acquisition and hiring processes
Expediting customer onboarding with reusable IDs
Building and expanding ecosystems of verifiers for verified data
competitive_advantages: Reusable verified data ('Verify once, reuse everywhere')
Ability to create new ecosystems of verifiers
Compliance with eIDAS and mDL standards
compliance_features: Support for mobile driver's licenses (mDLs) standards
security_features: Digital ID wallets and documents (for secure identity management)
